hero.title: Where Creativity Meets Strategy
hero.description: Leqta is a full-service content marketing & production company based in Algiers. We combine storytelling, strategy, and visual excellence to empower your brand with impactful video content.

about.title: We are LEQTA
about.description: A content marketing & film production agency based in Algiers. We serve brands, businesses, and changemakers with purposeful video content that blends creativity and strategy.

aboutHero.title: We are LEQTA
aboutHero.description: A content marketing & film production agency based in Algiers. We serve brands, businesses, and changemakers with purposeful video content that blends creativity and strategy.

services.title: What We Do
services.description: At LEQTA, we deliver video content that performs. Whether you're launching a campaign, telling your brand story, or creating cinematic visuals we've got you covered.
services.contactUsDescription: Let's discuss how we can help bring your vision to life. Our team is ready to create something amazing together.
services.choosePlanDescription: Select a plan that fits your needs and let's get started on your project.

header.title: Basic Production
header.description: Leqta offers flexible production options to match your content needs and brand ambitions. Choose between our efficient Basic Plan or a fully tailored Premium Plan designed around your objectives.

basicPlan.title: Basic Plan
basicPlan.description: Ideal for brands needing a simple, fast production for a small batch of video content.
features: Basic editing for all 5 videos (cutting, transitions, basic color correction, music/logo overlay)

premiumPlan.title: Premium Plan
premiumPlan.description: For brands with larger content needs, creative ambitions, or advanced technical requirements. This plan is 100% customized to your brand, objectives, and creative vision.
features: Additional equipment (e.g., drone, sliders, multi-cam setup)
Advanced editing (motion graphics, subtitling, brand animation)

works.title: Our Works
works.description: From powerful brand firms to bold social campaigns, creativity with strategy to connect, perform, and inspire. Here's a look at what we've created with our amazing clients.
works.letsWorkTogether: Let's create something amazing together. Get in touch to discuss your next project.

perfectPartner.title: Consistent Growth in Just a Simple 3-Steps
perfectPartner.description: We follow a structured, data-driven process to ensure your marketing strategy delivers consistent growth and measurable results.

missionVision.title: Built with Purpose
missionVision.description: At Leqta, clarity of purpose meets creative intent. Our vision, mission, and essence define how we think, work, and grow.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Leading Algeria's creative industry with impactful video content

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Empowering businesses through innovative content and filmmaking

competitiveEdge.title: Our Competitive Edge
competitiveEdge.description: At Leqta, we blend bold creativity with strategic marketing know-how. This balance ensures high-performing content with visual impact.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it
testimonials.successStoriesTitle: Success Stories From Our Happy Clients

faq.title: Answers to Your Top Questions
faq.description: Check out our frequently asked questions to learn more about our process, services and what to expect.

contact.title: Let's Start Your Project
contact.description: Ready to bring your vision to life?
contact.contactDescription: Whether you have a project in mind or a question about our services, we'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about what you're looking for...
form.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.

form.personalInfoDescription: Let's start with your basic contact information.

form.projectDetailsDescription: Tell us about your project requirements
form.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your project, goals, and requirements
form.goalsPlaceholder: What do you hope to achieve with this project?

blog.title: The LEQTA Blog
blog.description: Data-led technology strategies that boost brand engagement and impact. Explore insights in talent stories from our studios in Algeria. Explore real-world impact.
blog.allArticlesDescription: Explore our complete collection of insights and stories
blog.noArticles: No blogs available at the moment.

cookieConsent.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

lawReference.title: Law 18-07 Compliance:
lawReference.description: In accordance with Algerian Law No. 18-07 on the protection of personal data, we require your explicit consent before processing any personal information.

cookieConsent.rightsNotice: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. For more information about your rights under Law 18-07, please visit our Privacy Policy.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and secure access.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements based on your interests.

formConsent.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of my personal data.
formConsent.purposeText: Your information will be used only to contact you regarding your request and manage our professional relationship.
formConsent.dataRights: You may request access to or deletion of your personal data by contacting: data@leqta.com
formConsent.newsletterCheckboxLabel: I agree to the Privacy Policy

validation.consentRequired: You must agree to the Privacy Policy to continue

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At LEQTA, your privacy matters. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or contact us in compliance with Algerian Law No. 18-07.

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
informationCollect.personalInfoDesc: such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide through our contact forms.
informationCollect.usageDataDesc: including your IP address, browser type, device information, and pages visited, collected through cookies and analytics tools.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform. This includes responding to your inquiries, sending updates about our services, and analyzing usage patterns to enhance user experience.

dataProtection.title: How We Protect Your Data
dataProtection.content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

sharing.title: Sharing of Information
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share information with trusted service providers who help us operate the website — but only when necessary and under strict confidentiality agreements.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to understand website traffic and improve your experience. You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access the personal data we hold about you

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to other sites. We are not responsible for their content or privacy practices.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

emptyState.title: Content Not Available
emptyState.message: The privacy policy content is currently being updated. Please check back later.
